wikipedia_page.main:
Thomas Lockie (13 January 1906 – 27 July 1977) was a Scottish footballer and manager.
Lockie played for Duns, Rangers, Leith Athletic, Barnsley, York City, Accrington Stanley and Mansfield Town.He returned to York City in 1936 as reserve team coach and was promoted to first team trainer in 1937. He held this role for 23 years until becoming the manager in 1960, which he held until 1967.
